title: ANSEL_2.0
author: ANSEL_2.0
content: What are your AI investment projects for the next bull market? I am looking into OraiChain because it's an AI layer 1 project, very rare use case as we speak and also I am looking into aiRight, I believe if AI will make some noise in future these projects will bring good amount of profit, which AI project is on your watchlist now.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: ANSEL_2.0 on March 17, 2023, 09:02:55 AMWhat are your AI investment projects for the next bull market? I am looking into OraiChain because it's an AI layer 1 project, very rare use case as we speak and also I am looking into aiRight, I believe if AI will make some noise in future these projects will bring good amount of profit, which AI project is on your watchlist now. These days a lot of AI-related projects are popular. But the problem is that may be changing from time to time. My current watchlist AI-related projects are CryptoGPT and the Graph.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Not giving all funds or utmost targeting AI projects but I have one invested on cryptogpt but its still a 50/50 chanfe of success since its an altcoin. But thinking of huge Ai projects would be agix, but since it did pump a lot already I might need to cancel my plan of purchasing it or at least wait for it to have a lower price. I dont want to fomo cause surely it will burn me to the ground once the market crashes again.

comments.author: Lainta
comments.body: Quote from: ANSEL_2.0 on March 17, 2023, 09:02:55 AMWhat are your AI investment projects for the next bull market? I am looking into OraiChain because it's an AI layer 1 project, very rare use case as we speak and also I am looking into aiRight, I believe if AI will make some noise in future these projects will bring good amount of profit, which AI project is on your watchlist now. It's important to note that investing in any project carries risk, including AI projects. While AI has the potential to transform industries and create significant value, there are also challenges and uncertainties surrounding the development and implementation of AI technologies. Therefore, it's important to do your own research and due diligence before investing in any project.That being said, some factors that investors may want to consider when evaluating AI projects include the technology's potential impact on the industry, the quality of the development team, the level of adoption and interest from other investors, and the overall market trends.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: I am not that convinced about Crypto AI projects for now, I have not seen any that wow me, just like Chat GPT has done until then, if there are any free tokens to mine or Airdrop I will happily collect it and wait and see what comes out of it. I just believe the capital investment required to make AI projects succeed is huge and I don't see any project in this space with that kind of resources to deliver a good product

comments.author: OpenCEX
comments.body: Fetch.ai (FET), Phala Network (PHA), PlatON (LAT), Cortex (CTXC), Phoenix (PHB).

comments.author: Kalchef
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on March 19, 2023, 05:16:55 PMQuote from: ANSEL_2.0 on March 17, 2023, 09:02:55 AMWhat are your AI investment projects for the next bull market? I am looking into OraiChain because it's an AI layer 1 project, very rare use case as we speak and also I am looking into aiRight, I believe if AI will make some noise in future these projects will bring good amount of profit, which AI project is on your watchlist now. These days a lot of AI-related projects are popular. But the problem is that may be changing from time to time. My current watchlist AI-related projects are CryptoGPT and the Graph.I have my eye on CryptoGPT too and it is still very early to buy this token, I think it is capable of multiplying your money in next bull market with ease, the graph is not an AI project, I don't know why you people believe that the graph is AI, this is a data utility project.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: ANSEL_2.0 on March 17, 2023, 09:02:55 AMWhat are your AI investment projects for the next bull market? I am looking into OraiChain because it's an AI layer 1 project, very rare use case as we speak and also I am looking into aiRight, I believe if AI will make some noise in future these projects will bring good amount of profit, which AI project is on your watchlist now. None of them, artificial intelligence doesn't need a blockchain nor i can't find any solution that would benefit it and not just make it bulky and unnecessary.If you want to buy because of the hype, by all means do that as you can make money just by investing into memes too, but don't kid yourself it will be a real product. Very few projects benefit from any kind of blockchain based incentives.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Quote from: ANSEL_2.0 on March 17, 2023, 09:02:55 AMWhat are your AI investment projects for the next bull market? I am looking into OraiChain because it's an AI layer 1 project, very rare use case as we speak and also I am looking into aiRight, I believe if AI will make some noise in future these projects will bring good amount of profit, which AI project is on your watchlist now. Not familiar with AI that much, and my question is AI a cryptocurrency that works with a blockchain technology?I see the hype with ChatGPT but upon reading more details about it, it confirms that they are not crypto and they serve a different purpose so I'm quiet hesitant to join the hype because I know there's still a risk with AI and its too early to get hyped.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I've got a list in my head but still unsure if I'll buy any of them because it seems that this AI thing is on hype but then, I'm not so optimistic about it. I've got but I haven't done my research yet for each of them or if I did, they're just little efforts. And that's why I'm not going to give that list because if someone believes in it and it turns out that project turns into a dump, I might be blamed or someone's investment might get crapped out of that opinion. I do agree with some insights here that AI is still on the phase of being questionable if it'll be at its best together with blockchain and crypto.

I am looking into OraiChain because it's an AI layer 1 project, very rare use case as we speak and also I am looking into aiRight, I believe if AI will make some noise in future these projects will bring good amount of profit, which AI project is on your watchlist now. Although I don't really spend a lot of time doing research in this area, I do have a project that I've been observing for quite some time, anyway they're pretty interesting in concept, and the actual product is having a lot of fun. also very good.If you've ever heard of it:https://www.coinecko.com/en/coins/bostromEven oraichain I only see quite mediocre in terms of product potential, perhaps next time we will see the trend of AI being spread even more.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: I think one of the good AI nowadays is no doubt the free-to-use one because others are not free and you need to pay before you can use their services. Chatgpt is free and if they create their own token after they become popular, it will surely be a trend and there will be no doubt that it will get to the top in no time. The other project that is offering the same kind should follow their footstep in order to be successful and to also be known all around the world.

comments.author: Retainly_Collie
comments.body: Quote from: yazher on March 20, 2023, 06:24:35 AMI think one of the good AI nowadays is no doubt the free-to-use one because others are not free and you need to pay before you can use their services. Chatgpt is free and if they create their own token after they become popular, it will surely be a trend and there will be no doubt that it will get to the top in no time. The other project that is offering the same kind should follow their footstep in order to be successful and to also be known all around the world.I agree with you on this, actually witnessing some AI tools I am quite amazed at its ability to solve many problems in life. While it's possible that people have been quite fomo following this trend lately, it's fair to say it's actually a potential area for many developers to take advantage of.The crypto sector also sees the combination of many complex technology fields, so as long as they can be applied, I believe and the opportunity to succeed is great.Before that FET was also one of the cryptos that I have followed for a long time, and wondering why its valuation is so low given the potential it has, even when it is close to $1, I still think it is much lower. self-expectations.

comments.author: Rasa nanas
comments.body: no, until now I have not invested in AI projects. to prepare for the next bullish phase I prefer investing in altcoins that are more well known to many people such as BNB and ETH. I think crypto with AI concept is just hype recently and no one knows how long this hype will last. but maybe some time in the future I will change my mind and invest some of the money I have into AI based projects.

comments.author: litepool.ru
comments.body: Quote from: Rasa nanas on March 20, 2023, 07:50:23 AMno, until now I have not invested in AI projects. to prepare for the next bullish phase I prefer investing in altcoins that are more well known to many people such as BNB and ETH. I think crypto with AI concept is just hype recently and no one knows how long this hype will last. but maybe some time in the future I will change my mind and invest some of the money I have into AI based projects.I see AI as an area full of potential and growth especially in regards to Blockchain, but it must be admitted that the signs of hype are clear right now. But I am sure it will gradually become a big trend in this market, basically if you missed it, don't worry about it, because ETH BNB is always a good choice for investment. .

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: The topic itself is very interesting and of course all this undoubtedly has a future. The projects that are named above deserve any attention. Personally, I am currently studying one such project, Algalon Ai, and for the time being I am considering it as an investment.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: I am interested in some AI projects, but actually I am still quite cautious and only observe some old projects, but I see that the possibility of their development is not high, maybe the price increase is beneficial from AI getting attention.However, the CryptoGPT project made me curious and also tried to find out the information surrounding it, and really nothing special.

comments.author: Pterosaur
comments.body: Be careful with AI coins and tokens, make sure you read what they are solving very carefully because some are trying to confuse the consumers that the AI technology is really needy and you won't still be able to figure out why, some are already confusing people with Data vs AI, they aren't the same thing but the idiot investors can't even tell the difference.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Haha, tricky guy  It is unlikely that anyone will share their own research about AI projects with you, because it is much easier to just ask than to figure it out on your own. Use public resources and do your own research, AI hype promises to be very hot.You can use the list of well-known projects https://cryptorank.io/tags/artificial-intelligence to see such projects. See which ones have the largest capitalization, where they are traded and invest.

comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on March 20, 2023, 04:38:42 PMHaha, tricky guy  It is unlikely that anyone will share their own research about AI projects with you, because it is much easier to just ask than to figure it out on your own. Use public resources and do your own research, AI hype promises to be very hot.You can use the list of well-known projects https://cryptorank.io/tags/artificial-intelligence to see such projects. See which ones have the largest capitalization, where they are traded and invest.Thats a very good list of AI projects, I can see Oraichain and Vaiot on the list, these two AI projects are my favorite, most especially Oraichain, the utility makes sense and very useful, I bet the project will do very well, I missed buying at 3$ and now it's very close to 6$. Maybe the next big hype in the crypto space could be AI, who knows? Maybe that's where the next 1000x gains will come from.
